feeds.text: Huge protest planned near Wagah border tomorrow! All patriots assemble at 10 AM. We will not be silenced. #BorderRights
The new drone cafe in Lahore is amazing! Best coffee in town.
Phase 1 is a go. The convoy will move at dawn. Avoid main checkpoint. Use the old smuggling route east of the crossing.
Local authorities are warning of potential traffic disruptions near the Wagah border due to a planned demonstration. Travelers are advised to seek alternate routes.
Anyone else seeing increased security presence around the border? Something feels off.
Just saw a suspicious looking van circle the customs building twice. Reported it. #StaySafe #Wagah
All units, comms silence until signal. The package is the priority. Distraction team is in place.
